import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; export default function ProductDetails(){ const[product,setProducts]=useState(null); const {id}= useParams(); useEffect(()=>{ fetch(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL+'/products/'+id) .then(res=>res.json()) .then(res => setProducts(res.Product)) },[]) function addtocart(cartItems,setCartItems){ } return product&&
{product && product.images && product.images.length > 0 && ( )}

{product.name}

{product._id}

{product.price}

- +

Status: 0 ?"text-success":"text-danger"} >{product.stock>0 ?"In Stock":"Out of Stock"}

Description:

{product.description}

Sold by: {product.seller}

};
